"You're in control - choose what info you want to share with apps."

Share your thoughts with our community
Not so fast! Wait a minute or two and try again.
Your published multiple comments containing items that violate our community standards. Your account is permanently suspended now. You can appeal against our decision using in-app feedback.
"Can't play audio track due to copyright restrictions"
"Can't play this video due to copyright restrictions"
"%1$s won't work unless you enable Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your device."
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are not supported by your device."
"%1$s won't run unless you update Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are currently updating."
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
This phone number was associated with Mi Account %2$s on %1$s. It will no longer be associated with Mi Account %3$s if you continue. Continue?
"Hi there! Mi Video is ready for an update. Update the app now to check out our new cool features! Mi Video Team"
"Sent logs successfully. ID:%s Send this code to the supervisor."

"You won't be able to use Mi Video online streaming services if you don't agree to our Privacy Policy. Tap \"Cancel\" to go back or \"Don't agree\" to continue and use Mi Video as a local player only."

"We've updated Mi Video Privacy Policy due to the adjustments in the services we offer. To fully understand your rights as a user as well as the ways in which we use your data, read and agree to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy before using the app."

"To be able to use its services, you must agree that %1$s will collect, process, and use your personal information. You'll be deemed to have read and agreed to our Privacy Policy when you tap \"Agree\" below."

"To be able to use this service, you need to allow %1$s to collect, process, and use your personal information in accordance with the Privacy Policy. By tapping \"Agree\" below, you're agreeing to Xiaomi's Privacy Policy and User Agreement.

Tapping \"Agree\" also allows Mi Video to access the list of apps installed on your device. With this permission, Mi Video will be able to share items, understand whether an app is installed on your device, which version of an app is installed, and whether an app is secure."

"Welcome to Mi Video! This app provides the following services:

- Online streaming services

- A local video player

Mi Video needs to collect necessary personal information to provide you with the basic services. You can learn how we handle the information we collect in our Privacy Policy. You'll be able to change the related settings in Settings > Passwords & security.

Read and agree to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy before using Mi Video."

By toggling off the switch, you withdraw your consent to the Privacy Policy of Mi Video. We will cease to collect your personal information. The personal information already collected and retained will be deleted within the specific period as required by applicable laws. Your withdrawal of consent to the Privacy Policy will be held as refusing to accept online services based on collected personal information.
Your device needs to connect to the network for you to be able to withdraw consent. Check your network settings and try again.
After you revoke authorization, the app will stop collecting data, and all the related data will be deleted from our servers. This might make the app virtually unusable. Revoke authorization anyway?
You can customize the list of your channels now.
This email address is already associated with another Mi Account.
The email address you entered is invalid.
This phone number is already associated with another Mi Account.
This phone number is already associated with another Mi Account
You can describe issues or provide suggestions here.
"Couldn't submit. Check your network settings and try again."
Submitted successfully. Thanks for your feedback!

Not enough storage space. Free up at least %d MB and launch the app again.
Logs are used only for diagnostics.

"We shall protect your personal information in accordance with the relevant laws and regulations. This app needs the following permissions to work normally:

Using camera (for setting your profile photo)

If you don't agree to grant such permissions, you won't be able to use some features of this app; however, its basic functionality will still be available to you. You can always restrict permissions or revoke your authorization in the Settings."

string.name: tip_pop
string.Data: Content from Moments is provided by Firework. In order to improve your viewing experience and receive more relevant content recommendations, allow Firework to collect, process, and use your personal information in accordance with its Privacy Policy. Read and agree to Firework Privacy Policy before using its services.
